subtitle: For a delicious sauce that not only flavours the chops but protect them from drying out, this is bound to be a winner.

method.text: Mix all the marinade ingredients together in a bowl. Brush the chops with the sauce before and during cooking.
Cook under a preheated grill or on a preheated barbecue for 8-10 min, turning and bastng occasionally.
Heat any remaining sauce in a pan. Serve with the chops.

title: Barbecued pork chops Provencale
